background: The problem involves determining the production quantity for a set of products in a week, given production rates, a profit per ton for each product, a limited number of available hours, and constraints on the minimum and maximum sales for each product.

parameters.definition: The production rate of each product in tons per hour
The profit per ton for each product
The lower limit on the tons of each product sold in a week
The upper limit on the tons of each product sold in a week
The total available hours in a week for production

constraints.description: Each product p must have a non-negative production quantity
Total production hours for all products must not exceed available hours
constraints.code:
# Add total production hours constraint
total_production_hours = gp.quicksum(ProductionQuantity[p] / ProductionRate[p] for p in range(ProductNum))
model.addConstr(total_production_hours <= AvailableHours, name="total_production_hours")

constraints.description: Each product must be sold in amounts at least equal to the specified minimum sale amount for the respective product.
Each product must be sold in amounts no more than its maximum sale limit
The total production time for all products must not exceed the available hours
constraints.code:
# Add constraint for total production time not exceeding available hours
total_production_time = gp.quicksum((ProductionQuantity[p] / ProductionRate[p]) for p in range(ProductNum))
model.addConstr(total_production_time <= AvailableHours, name="production_time_limit")

constraints.description: Each product must be produced at least the minimum sale quantity
Each product must be produced at most the maximum sale quantity

variables.definition: The production quantity of product p in tons

objective.description: Maximize the total profit gained from all products within the limited available production hours
objective.code:
# Define the objective function
model.setObjective(gp.quicksum(ProfitPerTon[p] * ProductionQuantity[p] for p in range(ProductNum)), gp.GRB.MAXIMIZE)
